name: Tiny Story 5 adventure
description:
In this offline adventure with no-Ads,  a fantastic and puzzling story awaits you! Meet dragons, little fairies and so much more. 

With Tiny Story 5 - Lizzy and the little fairies, live a fantastic adventure full of puzzles to solve. Many quests await you in this lovely story. If you like it, don't hesitate to play other Tiny Story games.

This game remains in the tradition of its predecessors, a nice point-and-click adventure game, full of interesting, cute, fun puzzles, without ads or violence.

Relax by embodying the character of Lizzy who wants to cure her mother suffering from a strange disease. She will meet dragons, cute little fairies, and much more.

In addition to the puzzles, you can complete Lizzy's cute travel diary with adorable stamps and stickers found in the game. Can you find them all?

Walkthrough videos are available  to help you out if you get stuck with the game's puzzles
